00009 inline void diag_print(int level, char *format, ...)
00010 {
00011   if(diag_print_threshold < 0) {
00012     diag_print_setup();
00013   }
00014                                                                                 
00015   // Return immediately if we don't even need to format the message.
00016   if(level > diag_print_threshold && level > diag_cm_msg_threshold) {
00017     return;
00018   }
00019 
00020   va_list argp;
00021   va_start(argp, format);
00022   diag_print_impl(level, format, argp);
00023   va_end(argp);
